OOC( Feline and Skulletron are still in the Cybertron Fire.  The 
battle in which HotRod is in, it is too far away. Besides, how would 
Skulletron know about HotRod being hurt if they are still inside the 
ship?  But HotRod could be brought into the ship in damaged condition 
after the fight.  SO Feline would still be able to reek havoc after 
he is brought back to the ship.)

::Feline::

She smiled at the thought of destroying the maximals from within.  
They would never expect a friend to turn on them like that.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Skulletron/Necromancer::
> 
>       Skulletron looked at Feline.
> 
>       "Hey, beautiful, we'll go get that fool Hot Rod.  Be careful, 
I think we might see some fireworks if we don't stay hidden," He said.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Necromancer saw Breakdown coming at him.  He ran towards 
the Oblitercon, and then did a somersault over him.  He ran up to a 
tree, and then did a flying kick right through the tree.  Necromancer 
quickly picked up the tree, struggling not to drop it.  He used all 
his might to lift it up, and TRY to drop it on top of Breakdown
